.
Authorizing Direct Payment Due to a Statutory Change in the Age of Majority
To authorize a direct payment because of a statutory change in the age of majority,
change the name and address of the payee, and
make the change to direct payment effective the date in the LAST PAID DATE field on the AWARD INFORMATION tab in Share.
Exception
:  If payments are being made through a
court-appointed
fiduciary, refer the request for direct payment to the hub before making any change.
Reference
:  For more information on the actions to take when an age of majority diary expires, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.E.3.b
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section E - Authorizing Awards for Fiduciary Cases
